CustomField.description: For the Approval email to Sales Ops with products and quantities. Not needed for page layout..
CustomField.formula: 'Product: '& Product_Name__r.Name&br()& 'Quantity: '& text(Quantity__c) &br()& 'Product: '& Product_Name_2__r.Name&br()& 'Quantity: '& text(Quantity_2__c) &br()& 'Product: '& Product_Name_3__r.Name&br()& 'Quantity: '& text(Quantity_3__c) &br()& 'Product: '& Product_Name_4__r.Name&br()& 'Quantity: '& text(Quantity_4__c) &br()& 'Product: '& Product_Name_5__r.Name&br()& 'Quantity: '& text(Quantity_5__c) &br()
CustomField.label: Product & Quantity
